title: Russian Convoy Heads To Ukraine, Bearing Aid â€” But Some Suspect Foul Play
teaser: A Russian convoy of nearly 300 trucks has left for eastern Ukraine, carrying what Russia claims to be humanitarian aid. Ukrainian leaders suspect the convoy could be a cover for a military operation. Katherin Hille of the Financial Times joins Robert Siegel to discuss the situation.
